price: Allah’a döndürüleceğiniz ve zulme uğratılmadan herkese kazandığı şeyin ödeneceği günden korunun.
arabic: وَٱتَّقُواْ يَوۡمٗا تُرۡجَعُونَ فِيهِ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ ثُمَّ تُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّا كَسَبَتۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittaqū yawman tur'jaʿūna fīhi ilā al-lahi thumma tuwaffā kullu nafsin mā kasabat wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
